attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a definite argument that to the smoker, the distraction of the craving for a cigarette will be considerably higher than the distraction of actually smoking behind the wheel.  If we ban smoking behind the wheel, then we should ban listening to the car radio in case we hear something funny and laughing distracts us! In fact, if ALL distractions are removed for drivers how many more will fall asleep at the wheel?
